node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We kick off the episode talking about Manhattans which turns into a Milkshake check-in. We review and comment on some listener comments. Angie left a comment with some suggestions for our 2020 resolutions/goals. Stan continues his trend of getting rid of thingsâ€¦
